addAdmin(address).details: the caller must themselves have the ADMIN_ROLE

params.user: the address to give the ADMIN_ROLE to

addRole(address,uint256).details: the caller must have the ADMIN_ROLEthe roles recognised by the vault are  ADMIN_ROLE (0), TRADER_ROLE (1) and TREASURER_ROLE (2), other roles can be given and removed, but they have no special meaning for the vault

params.signer: the address to which to give the role

addTrader(address).details: the caller must have the ADMIN_ROLE

params.user: the address to give the TRADER_ROLE to

addTreasurer(address).details: the caller must have the ADMIN_ROLE

params.user: the address to give the TREASURER_ROLE to

returns._0: true if the user has the ADMIN_ROLE
true if the user has the TRADER_ROLE
true if the user has the TREASURER_ROLE

isValidSigner(address,uint256).details: the roles recognised by the vault are  ADMIN_ROLE (0), TRADER_ROLE (1) and TREASURER_ROLE (2), other roles can be given and removed, but they have no special meaning for the vault

returns._0: true if the user has the specified role

makeDeposit(uint256).details: the vault must have at least the specified amount before calling this functionthe caller must have the TREASURER_ROLE

params.amount: the amount of tokens to transfer

removeAdmin(address).details: the caller must themselves have the ADMIN_ROLE

params.user: the address from which to remove the ADMIN_ROLE

removeRole(address,uint256).details: the caller must have the ADMIN_ROLEthe roles recognised by the vault are  ADMIN_ROLE (0), TRADER_ROLE (1) and TREASURER_ROLE (2), other roles can be given and removed, but they have no special meaning for the vault

params.signer: the address from which to remove the role

removeTrader(address).details: the caller must have the ADMIN_ROLE

params.user: the address from which to remove the TRADER_ROLE

removeTreasurer(address).details: the caller must have the ADMIN_ROLE

params.user: the address from which to remove the TREASURER_ROLE

setBfx(address).details: WARNING incorrect setting could lead to loss of funds when calling makeDeposit, normally set during deploymentonly the vault owner can call this function

params._bfx: the address of the bfx exchange contract

setPaymentToken(address).details: WARNING must match the payment token address on the bfx exchange  contract, normally set during deploymentonly the vault owner can call this function

params._paymentToken: the address of the payment token

withdrawTokensTo(uint256,address).details: the vault must already have a sufficient token balance, calling this function does not withdraw funds from the bfx  exchange to the vaultonly the vault owner can call this function

params.amount: the amount of tokens to withdraw
params.to: the address to which to send the tokens

addAdmin(address).notice: give the user the ADMIN_ROLE - which gives  the ability to add and remove roles for other users

addRole(address,uint256).notice: give the user the specified role

addTrader(address).notice: give the user the TRADER_ROLE - which gives the ability to trade on the bfx exchange with the vault's funds

addTreasurer(address).notice: give the user the TREASURER_ROLE - which gives the ability to deposit the vault's funds into the bfx exchange

isAdmin(address).notice: does the user have the ADMIN_ROLE - which gives  the ability to add and remove roles for other users

isTrader(address).notice: does the user have the TRADER_ROLE - which gives  the ability to trade on the bfx exchange with the vault's funds

isTreasurer(address).notice: does the user have the TREASURER_ROLE - which gives  the ability to deposit the vault's funds into the bfx exchange

isValidSigner(address,uint256).notice: does the user have the specified role

makeDeposit(uint256).notice: transfers funds from the vault to the bfx exchange contract

removeAdmin(address).notice: take away the ADMIN_ROLE - which removes  the ability to add and remove roles for other users

removeRole(address,uint256).notice: take away the specified role from the user

removeTrader(address).notice: take away the TRADER_ROLE - which removes the ability to trade on the bfx exchange with the vault's funds

removeTreasurer(address).notice: take away the TREASURER_ROLE - which removes the ability to deposit the vault's funds into the bfx exchange

setBfx(address).notice: sets the address of the bfx exchange contract

setPaymentToken(address).notice: sets the address of the IERC20 payment token used by the bfx exchange

withdrawTokensTo(uint256,address).notice: withdraws funds from the vault, not normally used  as no funds are held on the vault - staking sends them directly  to the bfx exchange
